title: Noj tutorials
text:
This is part of the Scicloj Clojure Data Scrapbook.






1 Preface
Noj (short for Scinojure) is an opinionated way to use the emerging Clojure data stack. It collects a few of the relevant libraries together and addes some layers of composition on top of them.




source: projects/noj/notebooks/index.clj

title: 2  Machine learning - DRAFT
text:
2.1 Linear regression
We will explore the Iris dataset:

(def additive-pipeline
  (ml/pipeline
   (mm/set-inference-target :sepal-length)
   (mm/drop-columns [:species])
   {:metamorph/id :model}
   (mm/model {:model-type :smile.regression/ordinary-least-square})))



(def evaluations
  (ml/evaluate-pipelines
   [additive-pipeline]
   (ds/split->seq datasets/iris :holdout)
   ml/rmse
   :loss
   {:other-metrices [{:name :r2
                      :metric-fn fastmath.stats/r2-determination}]}))



(-> evaluations
    flatten
    first
    :fit-ctx
    :model
    ml/thaw-model)

petal-width        -0.5929     0.1640    -3.6144     0.0005 ***

title: 3  Exploring ggplot
text:
This is part of the Scicloj Clojure Data Scrapbook.





following cxplot’s internal ggplot.as.list in representing a plot as a data structure.

(ns ggplot
  (:require [clojisr.v1.r :as r :refer [r r$ r->clj]]
            [clojisr.v1.applications.plotting :as plotting]
            [scicloj.kindly.v4.kind :as kind]))


(r/library "ggplot2")


[1] "ggplot2"   "Rserve"    "stats"     "graphics"  "grDevices" "utils"    
[7] "datasets"  "methods"   "base"     



(def plot
  (r "(ggplot(mpg, aes(cty, hwy, color=factor(cyl)))
         + geom_point()
         + stat_smooth(method=\"lm\")
         + facet_wrap(~cyl))"))


(-> plot
    plotting/plot->svg
    kind/html)



                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              


(-> plot
    r->clj
    (dissoc :data))


{:layers [nil nil],
 :scales nil,
 :mapping {:x [~ cty], :y [~ hwy], :colour [~ [factor cyl]]},
 :theme [],
 :coordinates nil,
 :facet nil,
 :plot_env nil,
 :labels {:x ["cty"], :y ["hwy"], :colour ["factor(cyl)"]}}


(defn gg-facet [ggplot]
  (let [f (-> ggplot
              (r$ 'facet)
              (r$ 'params)
              (r$ 'facets))]
    (when (-> `(is.null ~f)
              r
              r->clj)
      (let [facet (r `(ls ~f))]
        {:facet facet
         :facet-levels (-> plot
                           (r$ 'data)
                           (r/bra facet))}))))


(-> plot
    gg-facet
    (update-vals r->clj))




{



:facet ["cyl"]






:facet-levels

(r/require-r '[base])


nil


(defn ->clj
  ([r-obj avoid]
   (->clj r-obj avoid []))
  ([r-obj avoid path]
   (prn path)
   (let [relevant-names (some->> r-obj
                                 r.base/names
                                 r->clj
                                 (filter (complement avoid)))]
     (cond
       ;;
       ;; a named list or a ggproto object
       (seq relevant-names) (->> relevant-names
                                 (map (fn [nam]
                                        [(keyword nam) (-> r-obj
                                                           (r$ nam)
                                                           (->clj avoid
                                                                  (conj path nam)))]))
                                 (into {}))
       ;;
       ;; a ggproto method
       (-> r-obj
           r.base/class
           r->clj
           first
           (= "ggproto_method"))
       :ggproto-method
       ;;
       ;; an unnamed list
       (-> r-obj
           r.base/is-list
           r->clj
           first)
       (-> r-obj
           r.base/length
           r->clj
           first
           range
           (->> (mapv (fn [i]
                        (prn [path (inc i)])
                        (-> r-obj
                            (r/brabra (inc i))
                            (->clj avoid
                                   (conj path [i])))))))
       ;;
       (r.base/is-function r-obj) :function
       (r.base/is-atomic r-obj) (r->clj r-obj)
       :else r-obj))))


(-> plot
    (->clj #{"data" "plot_env"}))


{:layers
 [{:aes_params [],
   :stat {:compute_layer :ggproto-method, :super :ggproto-method},
   :show.legend :function,
   :mapping :function,
   :super :ggproto-method,
   :computed_stat_params {:na.rm :function},
   :inherit.aes :function,
   :geom_params {:na.rm :function},
   :geom
   {:non_missing_aes :function,
    :draw_key :ggproto-method,
    :default_aes
    {:shape :function,
     :colour :function,
     :size :function,
     :fill :function,
     :alpha :function,
     :stroke :function},
    :super :ggproto-method,
    :required_aes :function,
    :draw_panel :ggproto-method},
   :stat_params {:na.rm :function},
   :constructor :function,
   :computed_mapping {:x :function, :y :function, :colour :function},
   :position {:compute_layer :ggproto-method, :super :ggproto-method},
   :computed_geom_params {:na.rm :function}}
  {:aes_params [],
   :stat
   {:extra_params :function,
    :super :ggproto-method,
    :compute_group :ggproto-method,
    :required_aes :function,
    :setup_params :ggproto-method,
    :dropped_aes :function},
   :show.legend :function,
   :mapping :function,
   :super :ggproto-method,
   :computed_stat_params
   {:na.rm :function,
    :method :function,
    :n :function,
    :orientation :function,
    :level :function,
    :fullrange :function,
    :flipped_aes :function,
    :se :function,
    :formula :function,
    :method.args [],
    :span :function},
   :inherit.aes :function,
   :geom_params
   {:se :function, :na.rm :function, :orientation :function},
   :geom
   {:setup_params :ggproto-method,
    :super :ggproto-method,
    :draw_key :ggproto-method,
    :extra_params :function,
    :required_aes :function,
    :draw_group :ggproto-method,
    :optional_aes :function,
    :rename_size :function,
    :setup_data :ggproto-method,
    :default_aes
    {:colour :function,
     :fill :function,
     :linewidth :function,
     :linetype :function,
     :weight :function,
     :alpha :function}},
   :stat_params
   {:na.rm :function,
    :method :function,
    :n :function,
    :orientation :function,
    :level :function,
    :fullrange :function,
    :se :function,
    :formula :function,
    :method.args [],
    :span :function},
   :constructor {: :function, :method :function},
   :computed_mapping {:x :function, :y :function, :colour :function},
   :position {:compute_layer :ggproto-method, :super :ggproto-method},
   :computed_geom_params
   {:se :function,
    :na.rm :function,
    :orientation :function,
    :flipped_aes :function}}],
 :scales {:scales [], :super :ggproto-method},
 :mapping {:x :function, :y :function, :colour :function},
 :theme [],
 :coordinates
 {:expand :function,
  :clip :function,
  :limits {:x :function, :y :function},
  :super :ggproto-method,
  :default :function},
 :facet
 {:params
  {:dir :function,
   :nrow :function,
   :as.table :function,
   :free {:x :function, :y :function},
   :drop :function,
   :strip.position :function,
   :ncol :function,
   :facets {:cyl :function},
   :labeller :function},
  :shrink :function,
  :super :ggproto-method},
 :labels {:x :function, :y :function, :colour :function}}
